summary: Spirit of the Ancient Traveler is a ghost located in Wayward Pass. It was deleted by Bethesda for no reason. This mod simply reenables it.
descriptionHtml:
Spirit of the Ancient Traveler is a ghost located in Wayward Pass. It was deleted by Bethesda for no reason.

It is a simple mod, I created it for myself, but I decided to share it with you. I hope you will enjoy it.

It should be compatible with everything. The only area what was edited is WaywardExterior cell.
No DLCs are required, only an updated Skyrim.

Credits:
Ruled/Rokax

No thanks to Bethesda for removing it.
author: Ruled
